name: electron-ffmpeg-eq
description: Minimal Electron + FFmpeg EQ proof of concept

scripts.asr:check: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const b=process.env.ASR_BACKEND||'mock';console.log('ASR Backend:',b);if(b==='whispercpp'){const m=process.env.WHISPER_MODEL||'';const bin=process.env.WHISPER_CPP_BIN||'/opt/homebrew/bin/whisper-cli';console.log('Model path:',m||'NOT SET');console.log('Binary path:',bin);let failed=false;if(!m||!fs.existsSync(m)){console.log('✗ Model file NOT FOUND');failed=true}else{console.log('✓ Model file exists')}if(!fs.existsSync(bin)){console.log('✗ Binary NOT FOUND');failed=true}else{console.log('✓ Binary exists')}if(failed)process.exit(1)}else{console.log('(Using mock backend — no model/binary required)')}"
